entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Morrisburg
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Clearing near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Sunny. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 14 January 2023
